seniority_level.evidence: Advanced technical requirements including PySpark expertise, Data Mesh architecture, AWS experience, and expectations of autonomy and proactivity suggest senior level despite no explicit seniority in title

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and all responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL/ELT, data processing, and data platform work

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on 'pipelines massifs' (massive pipelines), Apache Airflow orchestration, and ETL/ELT processing indicates batch processing paradigm rather than streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team management, or hiring responsibilities; focus is on technical execution and autonomy

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS explicitly mentioned multiple times with specific reference to S3 storage service and AWS infrastructure

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only AWS mentioned, no other cloud providers referenced in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Apache Airflow orchestration and focus on ETL/ELT pipelines indicates batch processing approach

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow explicitly mentioned as the orchestration tool for workflows

storage_layer.evidence: AWS S3 mentioned as primary storage, which is object storage typical of data lake architectures

remote_restriction.evidence: No mention of remote work policy, work model, or location restrictions in the job posting

timezone_focus.evidence: Job located in Liège, Belgium suggests European timezone focus, though no explicit timezone requirements mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Position based in Liège with no mention of relocation requirements or relocation packages

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, and H1B is US-specific while this is a Belgian position

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support (OPT/CPT), and no work authorization discussion in posting

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements mentioned in the job posting

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No contract type, employment type, or compensation structure mentioned in the job posting

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned in the job posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, senior collaboration, or learning opportunities mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, promotion paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Indispensables' (must-have) and 'Ce Qui Fera La Différence' (differentiating) skills, with multiple technical requirements marked as essential

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined role focused specifically on data engineering with clear responsibilities in pipeline engineering, orchestration, and cloud infrastructure

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Technical requirements (PySpark, Airflow, AWS, Data Mesh) are appropriate for senior data engineer level, no unrealistic skill combinations detected
